meanings.definition: A large North American deer with a reddish-brown coat and a shaggy mane.
meanings.sent1: The wapitis grazed peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: We saw a herd of wapitis while hiking in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The wapitis decided to have a dance-off in the clearing.
meanings.sent4: The majestic wapitis moved through the trees like spirits of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the wapitis roaming freely left a lasting impression on us.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'wapiti', referring to more than one of these deer.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the wapitis crossing the river together.
meanings.sent2: The wapitis' antlers were an impressive sight in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The wapitis held a meeting to discuss their favorite grazing spots.
meanings.sent4: The wapitis' presence in the valley painted a picture of harmony.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the wapitis bugling echoed through the mountains.
